details: Induction for FYBMS was organised on 7th July 2017
Seminar on 'Careers in JAVA' conducted by 'Impetus Consultrainers'.
MARATHI RAJBHASHA GAURAV DIN celebrated in tribute to poet Vishnu Vaman Shirwadkar.
Industrial Visit to Aurangabad (26th Feb to 1st Mar) - 117 BMS students visited Videocon D2H factory.
BFM Industrial Visit to Silvassa (21–23 Feb). Visited Alok Industries Ltd and Parle Industries Ltd. 43 students attended.
Seminar on 'College world to corporate world for successful future' by The British Institute.
Techfest EDIT V4.0 themed 'TECHMERIZE' with 700 students in 27 events. Managed by 150 volunteers.
Seminar on 'Advanced Excel and PowerPoint' by Mpower CorpEdutors.
Seminar on 'Anti Human Trafficking' by NGO 'Justice and Care'.
Seminar on 'Strategies for Equity Trading' by Phillip Capital India Pvt Ltd.
Seminar on investing in 'StockMind' by ICICI Securities Ltd for BFM students.
Industrial Visit to NSE with live trading sessions by Mr. Vijay Bhambwani.
Industrial Visit to SEBI. Investor Awareness session by Ms. Molly George.
Wealth Management Workshop at DISHA 2017 by AIWMI for SYBMS/TYBMS students.
Visit to Bombay Stock Exchange for SYBMS/TYBMS Finance Students. 40 students participated.
Guest Lecture on 'Introduction to Stock Markets'.
Orientation Program for FYBSc(IT) students.
Panel discussion on 'Tax Transit: Unboxing GST' with senior tax officers, professionals & industry leaders.
PPT presentation finale of 'Tax Transit: Unboxing GST'. Eliminations held earlier on 29th July.
Final GST Panel session and presentation covering 8 sectors. Highly interactive and appreciated by judges & audience.
Awareness campaign on Isha Foundation’s 'Rally for Rivers'.
Eliminations for GST-based PPT competition. 12 teams participated. Judges: Mr. Aalok Mehta and Mr. Ashit Shah.
Training on 'Group Discussion and Aptitude Test' for TYBSc(IT).
IT Dept. in association with IIT Bombay’s Spoken Tutorial platform. Students enrolled for C, CPP, JAVA etc.
Seminars on 'JAVA vs .NET' and 'Interview Techniques' conducted by SEED Infotech.
Spoken tutorial test on Java conducted for BScIT Students.
Inter-Class Quiz for FY, SY, TY BFM students.
Intra-department quiz organized for BFM students of all years.
Lead organiser for SYBMS Syllabus Revision Workshop.
SYBMS Syllabus workshop attended by 80+ faculties. Chaired by Dr. Gadade and Dr. Ajgaonkar from Univ. of Mumbai.
TYBFM syllabus revision workshop conducted by BoS members from Hinduja, Viva Colleges etc.
Assisted in organising SYBMS syllabus revision workshop jointly with University of Mumbai.
Participated in syllabus revision workshop organized jointly with university committee members.
Seminar on 'How to prepare for competitive exams' conducted by Mr. Gulab Nebhani of Planet E.
Industrial Visit for Production and Total Quality Management at Mandhana Printing and Dyeing for 45 SYBMS students.
IIT Bombay Spoken Tutorial program was initiated for SYBSc(IT) students.
Expert lecture on Data Warehouse conducted by Mr. Rajendra Patil for TYBSc(IT) students.
Educational Visit at MRVL Tarapur for Production & TQM subject. SYBMS students participated.
Expert lecture on Project Management by Mrs. Jayalakshmi for TYBSc(IT) students.
Expert lecture on Internet Technologies by Mr. Mandar Bhave.
Employability test conducted for BFM students.
Lecture on 'Software Testing – Syllabus to Corporate World' for SY & TYBSc(IT).
Nokia Here placement aptitude test conducted. 2 students selected.
Seminar organized by SEED Infotech for SY/TY BSc(IT).
Boot Camp for TYBMS students by ISME. 23 students participated.
Finatix event organized under guidance of Ms. Payal Bhatia, CA Darshak Doshi, and CA Chandrashekhar Sawant.
Expert lecture on Commodities & Derivatives Markets by Dr. Smitha Shukla.
Industrial Tour to RBI Fort, sessions on RBI Monetary Policy & Initiatives.
PPT Fiesta – intercollegiate PowerPoint presentation competition. 8 teams participated.
